snippet.textDisplay:
Lords of the Fallen 2.0 has made some great improvements! 

Having purchased this game on release I‚Äôm finally starting to feel like I got my money‚Äôs worth. 

Game does needs a bit more work though.

My experience on PS5. 

1. Walking animations have a shaky jitter. I tried 2 different controllers with same outcome. So it wasn‚Äôt a stick drift issue. 

2. Visceral attacks, the ones with the prompt, don‚Äôt always work, even when locked-on. I noticed this issue more on dogs. It was almost 50/50. 

3. If you mess with any setting the game will continue to ask if you want to save before progressing, even if you put setting back and didn‚Äôt make a change. 

4. The HUD button layout is incorrect and doesn‚Äôt properly convey the controller layout.

5. Main menu still shows our character with no shirt for a brief second. It‚Äôs been like this since launch.

6. The Knock down animation for our main character is very poor and cartoony looking. 

7. Your can‚Äôt cancel a bow string pull by just releasing the L2 button, you have to dodge instead. 

8. There is major graphical clipping with capes and shields.

9. If you fall off a tall ledge the game‚Äôs camera literally rollercoasters back to the path where you leaped off. Looks a bit silly.

10. Enemies get stuck and float in environment a bit too frequent. 

11. Soft-lock sword attacks overshoot targets. 

I can definitely see the improvements with this 2.0 update. But overall game still needs a bit more help.

snippet.textDisplay: Dang, kudos to these devs. Their approach is pretty brilliant. They are breaking into a genre that has a lot of strong opinions of how things in these games should be and they are taking all the player feedback to make improvements to the game. Not only that, they will carry all this knowledge forward for LotF 2. This is how devs should operate. I'm glad I bought this game day one. I'm going to have to do another play through now!

snippet.textDisplay: I actually liked this game until I played the online portion of it. Everybody cheats and maxes out their resistances to all types of damage doing that stupid duplication glitch. And it isn't like there's going to be an update fixing it cuz there's no way to stop it from happening. So now you have people at level 50000 that take no damage from any of your attacks and 1 shot you. And the devs refuse to ban online services to the players who have done said glitch so online is unplayable because of invincible invaders killing you while you play with your friend. Until those players are banned from the online servers I will avoid this game like the plaque
